title: Remove the chance to get champion shards from chests
body:
Now that we get tons of them, don't fuck us over by keeping it possible to get them instead of skins from chests.

I know some people may think it's good to have another source of essence, but now that you get champion shards so often we do not need that.

replies.body: i opened 10 chest i was saving the past few months and only got 3 skin shards out of them, the rest was blue essence ans champ shards even though i own every champion already. i dont see why anyone would risk money to buy a chest+key when it seems like its over a 60% chance you get pretty much nothing.

Come on you know you want another {{champion:1}} shard out of that chest you spent money on
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I dint get Annie but u made me realize most of she champ chards were for the cheaper champs, i got a bunch of garen,poppy,alistar. all the cheap guys so the blue essence i got form it all wasn't even too great either.
yea i stopped spending left over Rp from skins to buy keys/chest because literally every single time i did all i got was a champion shard
can we remove the shot of getting champ shards in honor capsules because all i got was a ryze and a WW shard in mine.

This.

I understand their reasons for Hextech chests, but honor capsules? I’ve got like 2 since honor system came out (so, 4 months?) and what I’ve gotten was... a fucking Amumu shard and 2 key fragments, and a fucking Udyr shard (iirc, still worthless) and 3 key fragments.
At least you get key fragments. All I get are champ shards while I sit and wait for more key fragments to open my 7 chests.

I think they should do this only for people who have all the champs, because for me if I get 600 BE or a champ shard worth 600 BE that doesn't make a difference. HOWEVER, I did just make a post complaining about the shards not being worth enough BE so I can agree with that.

personally, i think there's nothing wrong with having have more sources of blue essence. But if riot wants to nerf the only source of orange essence by 40%, then they should definitely compensate for it by increasing the chances of getting skin shards, or even just ward skin shards; no one with a sober mind would ever purchase those ripoff chests for 125 RP.
Lol ive been playing since s4 and still dont have 50 of the champs

Well when you have been playing this game since before season 1, and you own almost every champ in the game, getting these champ shards is a kick in the nuts. They could come up with some coding that recognizes each persons account as an individual, and give us champ shards according to how many you own, the more you own the less likely you are to get champ shards. Also blue essence amounts should be comparable to the old IP amounts. Selling a 450 IP champ returns 90 blue essence now, that is just lame. Also to add onto the frequency of champ shards, make it smart, make it detect what we dont own, and give us access to those FIRST, before we see one we already own. This level of random is to RNG, and this game already has far to much of that in its game play.

You need to remember you're getting champion shards from leveling up now, as opposed to having chests be the only source before. Now that you're guaranteed 1-6 champion shards every level there's no reason you should need a chest and three fragments to get only one champion shard.

Honestly, the Hextech system has gone to shit. I literally just woke up, logged on, got a key fragment, made a key, opened a chest and got a single champion (Renekton) shard. Keep in mind, you STILL have to earn the hextech chests by getting S ranks in pvp games! That feels awful when all you got from something, that you (or a team mate) legitimately earned by doing well, is a single pretty much worthless shard. And as other people have already pointed out, there's already several ways for us to get champions shards, Champion capsules (upon leveling up), honor capsules, and now you also get BE for the first win of the day but even then we're still not really earning BE fast enough for those of us who DON'T own every champion the game has to offer. 

It just feels incredibly lackluster when you legitimately earned something and all you get from it is..well..trash. There's a few ways I would personally change this:

1. If you're going to give me something champion-related (from a chest that you HAVE to earn an S- or better to acquire) give me a fucking random champion straight out. even if I don't necessarily like or want the champion, at least it'll feel rewarding to have earned a new champion to maybe play at some point. 

OR

2. If you're not going to remove the chance of getting champion shards from hexchests, lower the requirements for earning a (regular) chest, say bump it down to earning A- to A+ (as well as increase the rate at which you can get them) and then insert the masterwork chest in the S- to S+ spot

OR

3. You could, y'know, revert back to the way chests were and eliminate the masterwork chest right out. 

My point, at the end of the day is, it now feels that even if you earn an S rank, there's too high of a chance to get something that doesn't feel rewarding. And it's not making me want to keep playing your game, Riot.

Every third chest is a skin shard (maybe ward?).
